metadata.title: Paris Bonjour and Eiffel Tower Rectangular Fridge Magnet (Personalized)
features: [Personalize It]: Create a Paris-themed aesthetic with your name.
[Durable & Glossy]: Crafted from robust aluminum with an attractive glossy finish for long-lasting use and enhanced design.
[Magnetic Backing]: Easily adheres to any magnetic surface for versatile use.
[Perfect Size]: Measures 2" x 3", making it an ideal size for fridge decor.
[Full-Surface Customization]: Design is printed across the entire front of the magnet.
description: Transform your fridge from a mere, boring appliance, into a space to display your creativity with a few of our personalized fridge magnets! These useful accessories secure papers, calendars, photos, and more. Customize a few for your fridge, or give them to family and friends as gifts or keepsakes!Our custom fridge magnets are crafted from aluminum, and feature a magnetic backing that allows it to adhere to magnetic surfaces, such as your fridge, a locker, dry erase boards, and more! The entire face of the magnet displays your design, and the glossy finish makes the surface of your magnet shine. This custom magnet measures at 2 by 3 inches.When cleaning your fridge magnet, we recommend wiping down its surface with water and a mild soap.Design Shown: Paris Bonjour and Eiffel Tower (#51489)Features:==================================== * [Durable & Glossy]: Crafted from robust aluminum with an attractive glossy finish for long-lasting use and enhanced design. * [Magnetic Backing]: Easily adheres to any magnetic surface for versatile use. * [Perfect Size]: Measures 2" x 3", making it an ideal size for fridge decor. * [Full-Surface Customization]: Design is printed across the entire front of the magnet.Care Instructions:==================================== * To clean wipe down with water and a mild detergent
